name: Sword in the Stone
author: Gaku Kumatori

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q:Can I choose a character with no damage on it for Sword in the Stone’s ability?

A: Yes, you can. However the chosen character will not gain any strength.

flavor_text: Whoso pulleth out this sword of this stone and anvil is rightwise king born of England.
rules_text: , 2 — Chosen character gets +1 this turn for each 1 damage on them.
